code:
# @param {String} word
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def count_complete_substrings(word, k)
    max_count = 0
    ('a'..'z').each do |first_char|
        ('a'..'z').each do |second_char|
            next if (first_char.ord - second_char.ord).abs > 2
            count, freq, k_count = 0, Hash.new(0), 0
            left = 0
            (0...word.length).each do |right|
                char = word[right]
                next unless char == first_char || char == second_char
                freq[char] += 1
                k_count += 1 if freq[char] == k
                while k_count == freq.keys.size
                    if right - left + 1 == k * freq.keys.size
                        count += 1
                        break
                    end
                    if freq[word[left]] == k
                        k_count -= 1
                    end
                    freq[word[left]] -= 1
                    left += 1
                end
            end
            max_count += count
        end
    end
    max_count
end
